exec.arg: for f in ../capicxx-dbus-runtime/src/dbus-patches/*.patch ; do patch -p1 <"$f" || exit 1 ; done

rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DWITH_DBUS_INTERFACE=ON -DWITH_FRANCA_DBUS_INTERFACE=OFF -DWITH_FRANCA_SOMEIP_INTERFACE=OFF -DWITH_TESTS=ON -DWITH_DEBUG=ON -DWITH_DLT=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug ../

rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DWITH_DBUS_INTERFACE=OFF -DWITH_FRANCA_DBUS_INTERFACE=ON -DWITH_FRANCA_SOMEIP_INTERFACE=OFF -DWITH_TESTS=ON -DWITH_DEBUG=ON -DWITH_DLT=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCOMMONAPI_TOOL_GENERATOR=/usr/local/bin/commonapi-generator-linux-x86_64 -DCOMMONAPI_DBUS_TOOL_GENERATOR=/usr/local/bin/commonapi-dbus-generator-linux-x86_64 ../

rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DWITH_DBUS_INTERFACE=OFF -DWITH_FRANCA_DBUS_INTERFACE=ON -DWITH_FRANCA_SOMEIP_INTERFACE=OFF -DWITH_TESTS=ON -DWITH_DEBUG=ON -DWITH_DLT=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCOMMONAPI_TOOL_GENERATOR=/usr/local/bin/commonapi-generator-linux-x86_64 -DCOMMONAPI_DBUS_TOOL_GENERATOR=/usr/local/bin/commonapi-dbus-generator-linux-x86_64 ../

rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake WITH_ENHANCED_POSITION_SERVICE=OFF WITH_SENSORS_SERVICE=OFF -DWITH_TESTS=ON -DWITH_DEBUG=ON -DWITH_DLT=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DWITH_REPLAYER=OFF -DWITH_GPSD=ON ../

rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DWITH_ENHANCED_POSITION_SERVICE=OFF -DWITH_NMEA=ON -DWITH_SENSORS=ON -DIMU_TYPE=LSM9DS1 -DWITH_LOGGER=ON -DWITH_TESTS=ON -DWITH_DEBUG=ON -DGNSS_DEVICE=\"/dev/ttyACM0\" -DGNSS_BAUDRATE=B38400 -DGNSS_CHIPSET=UBLOX -DGNSS_DELAY=50 ../
if [ -f scripts/checkout ]; then bash scripts/checkout; fi
export IMG_NAME=`source poky/oe-init-build-env | grep image | head -n 1` && source poky/oe-init-build-env && bitbake $IMG_NAME
rm -f logs.tar logs.tar.gz && find build/tmp/work \( -name "*.log" -o -name "log.*" -o -name "run.*" \) -print0 | xargs -0 tar uf logs.tar && gzip logs.tar
echo "(BEFORE): dir-pattern glob matches: " && shopt -s nullglob && list=(#{dir_pattern}) && echo ${list[@]}
echo "(AFTER): listing contents of dir-pattern: " && ls #{dir_pattern} || true
cd "/var/go/VirtualBox VMs/$(cat VMNAME)" && f=buildinfo.txt && echo -n "VM build completed on agent named: " >"$f" && hostname >> "$f" && date >> "$f" && env >>"$f"
SIZE=$(du -hs vimage_temp | awk '{print $1}') && mv vimage_temp gdp-sde-#{MACHINE}-virtualbox-image_$(cat FILESTAMP)_\($SIZE\).tar.gz
if [ -d source ] ; then tar cf - source | gzip -c -1 >sources.tar.gz ; else touch sources.tar.gz ; fi
for f in gdp-sd[ke]-#{MACHINE}-virtualbox-image*.tar.gz ; do md5sum "$f" >"$f.md5" ; done
cd "/var/go/VirtualBox VMs/$(cat VMNAME)" && f=buildinfo.txt && echo -n "VM build completed on agent named: " >"$f" && hostname >> "$f" && date >> "$f" && env >>"$f"
SIZE=$(du -hs vimage_temp | awk '{print $1}') && mv vimage_temp gdp-sde-#{MACHINE}-virtualbox-image_$(cat FILESTAMP)_\($SIZE\).tar.gz
if [ -d source ] ; then tar cf - source | gzip -c -1 >sources.tar.gz ; else touch sources.tar.gz ; fi
for f in gdp-sde-#{MACHINE}-virtualbox-image*.tar.gz ; do md5sum "$f" >"$f.md5" ; done
